ERC20 where value accrues through exchange rate appreciation - Backed by USDC held in this contract - Mint: deposit USDC -> mint GLUSD at current exchange rate - Redeem: burn GLUSD -> receive USDC at current exchange rate - Treasury deposits fees which increase the exchange rate for all holders - Onchain rate snapshots for APR/APY calculations - Pausable for emergency stops - 0.5% fee on mint/redeem sent to feeRecipient (configurable) - Alpha version: capped at MAX_TOTAL_SUPPLY for risk management","errors":{"ERC20InsufficientAllowance(address,uint256,uint256)":[{"details":"Indicates NOTE: Does not update the allowance if the current allowance is the maximum `uint256`. Requirements: - `from` and `to` cannot be the zero address. - `from` must have a balance of at least `value`. - the caller must have allowance for ``from``'s tokens of at least f12","dweb:/ipfs/Qmax9WHBnVsZP46ZxEMNRQpLQnrdE4dK8LehML1Py8FowF"]},"lib/openzeppelin-contracts/contracts/utils/Pausable.sol":{"keccak256":"0xdb484371dfbb848cb6f5d70464e9ac9b2900e4164ead76bbce4fef0b44bcc68f","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://f9d6f6f6600a2bec622f699081b58350873b5e63ce05464d17d674a290bb8a7c","dweb:/ipfs/QmQKVzSQY1PM3Bid4QhgVVZyx6B4Jx7XgaQzLKHj38vJz8"]},"lib/openzeppelin-contracts/contracts/utils/ReentrancyGuard.sol":{"keccak256":"0xa516cbf1c7d15d3517c2d668601ce016c54395bf5171918a14e2686977465f53","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://1e1d079e8edfb58efd23a311e315a4807b01b5d1cf153f8fa2d0608b9dec3e99","dweb:/ipfs/QmTBExeX2SDTkn5xbk5ssbYSx7VqRp9H4Ux1CY4uQM4b9N"]},"lib/openzeppelin-contracts/contracts/utils/StorageSlot.sol":{"keccak256":"0xcf74f855663ce2ae00ed8352666b7935f6cddea2932fdf2c3ecd30a9b1cd0e97","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://9f660b1f351b757dfe01438e59888f31f33ded3afcf5cb5b0d9bf9aa6f320a8b","dweb:/ipfs/QmarDJ5hZEgBtCmmrVzEZWjub9769eD686jmzb2XpSU1cM"]},"src/GLUSD.sol":{"keccak256":"0x1525a6def429e6e13d52f8af60e7afaac21e98c0d70cbfba1c81b10fac0028fb","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://41ac99b79bf6c26bc851962e7e75ae80e7b64f677d9ec056bd2588f4b37b3159","dweb:/ipfs/QmZE9CodHmgDtJHFai2MMJbnHUScTZ7YkhENCaGL2cZGUc"]}},"version":1}

allowance(address,address).details: Returns the remaining number of tokens that `spender` will be allowed to spend on behalf of `owner` through {transferFrom}. This is zero by default. This value changes when {approve} or {transferFrom} are called.

approve(address,uint256).details: See {IERC20-approve}. NOTE: If `value` is the maximum `uint256`, the allowance is not updated on `transferFrom`. This is semantically equivalent to an infinite approval. Requirements: - `spender` cannot be the zero address.

balanceOf(address).details: Returns the value of tokens owned by `account`.

params.daysAgo: Number of days ago to compare against (e.g., 7 for 7-day APR, max 90)

calculateAPY(uint256).details: APY = ((1 + periodicRate)^periods - 1) * 100, approximated for small rates

params.daysAgo: Number of days ago to compare against (max 90)

params._treasury: Address to be set as treasury
params._usdc: Address of the USDC token contract

depositFees(uint256).details: Only callable by treasury. Automatically takes rate snapshot if interval has passed.

params.amount: Amount of USDC to deposit as fees

exchangeRate().details: Returns the amount of USDC per 1 GLUSD token (scaled by 1e6)

returns.rate: Exchange rate at the most recent snapshot
returns.timestamp: Time of the most recent snapshot

returns.count: Number of snapshots available (max 2160, or totalSnapshotCount if less)

params.snapshotsAgo: How many snapshots back to retrieve (0 to 2159)

mint(uint256).details: User must approve USDC to this contract before calling. 0.5% fee is deducted.

params.usdcAmount: Amount of USDC to deposit (including fee)

name().details: Returns the name of the token.

paused().details: Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise.

redeem(uint256).details: 0.5% fee is deducted from USDC returned

returns.remaining: Amount of GLUSD that can still be minted

symbol().details: Returns the symbol of the token, usually a shorter version of the name.

takeSnapshot().details: Useful for updating yield calculations without depositing fees

totalSupply().details: Returns the value of tokens in existence.

transfer(address,uint256).details: See {IERC20-transfer}. Requirements: - `to` cannot be the zero address. - the caller must have a balance of at least `value`.

transferFrom(address,address,uint256).details: See {IERC20-transferFrom}. Skips emitting an {Approval} event indicating an allowance update. This is not required by the ERC. See {xref-ERC20-_approve-address-address-uint256-bool-}[_approve]. NOTE: Does not update the allowance if the current allowance is the maximum `uint256`. Requirements: - `from` and `to` cannot be the zero address. - `from` must have a balance of at least `value`. - the caller must have allowance for ``from``'s tokens of at least `value`.

MAX_SNAPSHOTS().notice: Maximum snapshots stored in circular buffer

MAX_TOTAL_SUPPLY().notice: Maximum total supply for alpha launch (1k GLUSD with 6 decimals)

SECONDS_PER_YEAR().notice: Seconds in a year for APR/APY calculations

calculateAPR(uint256).notice: Calculate APR based on rate change over a time period

calculateAPY(uint256).notice: Calculate APY (compound annual yield) based on rate change

decimals().notice: Returns the number of decimals (6 to match USDC)

depositFees(uint256).notice: Deposit fees into the vault (increases exchange rate for all holders)

exchangeRate().notice: Calculates the current exchange rate (USDC per GLUSD)

getCurrentAPRs().notice: Get current 7-day and 30-day APR for easy access

getSnapshotCount().notice: Get the number of rate snapshots currently stored in buffer

getSnapshotFromPast(uint256).notice: Get a snapshot from N snapshots ago (0 = most recent)

mint(uint256).notice: Mint GLUSD by depositing USDC at the current exchange rate

recentSnapshots(uint256).notice: Circular buffer of recent rate snapshots (max 90 days at 1 snapshot/hour)

redeem(uint256).notice: Redeem GLUSD for USDC at the current exchange rate

remainingMintableSupply().notice: Returns remaining mintable supply for alpha cap

rescueERC20(address,address,uint256).notice: Emergency token rescue (cannot rescue USDC backing)

snapshotIndex().notice: Current index in the circular buffer

takeSnapshot().notice: Manually take a rate snapshot (callable by anyone if interval has passed)

totalSnapshotCount().notice: Total number of snapshots taken (never decreases)

vaultStatus().notice: Returns current USDC balance and GLUSD supply
